name: Vines Of Fate
description:
everybody has a little vine in this life,

it is your time to create yours!

|

This game is made for GlobalGameJam22 in 48 hours

|

In this land where we chase our own life story, we climb the vines that determine our destiny and fight the obstacles that try to distance us from our destiny.

Like our destiny, each game sequence has been created uniquely, as in every life. A new vine of fate will greet you in each life!

CREW

Cevat Tahir Bayındır - 3D Artist & Animation

Furkan Özkan - Developer & SFX & Voiceover

Oskar Pernal - Developer
